Name: Retro TV Game Collection
About the game: Retro TV Game Collection is exactly that, a package of four time-honored classics from the dawn of home video games. Tennis The one that started it all, known by many names, an instantly recognizable institution of gaming history. Football Licensed players and teams? of course not! better to see your friends fall to pieces as you score the last minute winner? Absolutely. Squash (Practice Mode) Tired of being humiliated by your friends or the CPU? Practice against nothing but the wall. Hone your reflexes and see how high you can score. Squash Put those practice sessions to the test, same wall, new opponent. It may have taken 50 years but all games now feature these much needed improvements. Paddles no longer vanish off-screen! CPU opponent means a new 1 player mode! A score limit! A pause button! Full controller Support! Stats! Assist Mode! Steam Cloud Saves! Achievements! Update 2.0 is also adding . . . More achievements! Unlockables! Co-op mode! New menus! AND REMOTE PLAY!! All updates will be FREE, FOREVER!!!! ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - very soon . . . . . REALISTIC MODE - Sometimes quality of life updates are just not needed and only the original will do. AFTER THAT - Let us know, anything else missing? something not quite right? Get in touch. /
